attributes.name: Compression grade
attributes.description: Element details for compression grade.  Measured on axial T2-W images at level of greatest compression.

values.name: grade 1a
values.description: Epidural involvement without thecal sac deformation

values.name: grade 1b
values.description: Thecal sac deformation without cord contact

values.name: grade 1c
values.description: Thecal sac deformation with cord contact

values.name: grade 2
values.description: Cord compression with preservation of some CSF

values.name: grade 3
values.description: Cord compression with complete effacement of CSF
